Package ohos.agp.components

Interface ListContainer.ItemLongClickedListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ListContainer

    public static interface ListContainer.ItemLongClickedListener
    Provides the listener used to listen for and process long-click events of a ListContainer item.

    This class inherits from ItemLongClickedListener#onItemLongClicked(ListContainer, Component, int, long) to respond to the events.

    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean onItemLongClicked​(ListContainer parent, Component component, int position, long id)
      Called when a ListContainer item is long-clicked and processes the long-click event.

    • Method Detail

      • onItemLongClicked

        boolean onItemLongClicked​(ListContainer parent,
                          Component component,
                          int position,
                          long id)
        Called when a ListContainer item is long-clicked and processes the long-click event.
        Parameters:
        parent - Indicates the ListContainer object.
        component - Indicates the long-clicked Component item in the ListContainer object.
        position - Indicates the position of the long-clicked Component item in the ListContainer object.
        id - Indicates the row ID of the long-clicked item.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the long-click event is processed; returns false otherwise.
